appDescription.message: Provides omnibox search keyword 'con' for badge and account lookup with ability to print badges.

appInstallMsg.message:
IMPORTANT:  A new tab has been opened to your chrome settings.

You must change your default download location in Chrome to the network share connected to the printer for this workstation. Failure to do this step will result in this extension not doing anything!

In the settings window click 'Show advanced settings...', scroll down to 'Downloads' and click the 'Change...' button. Select the correct network share to save files to and click 'OK'

Ensure the 'Ask where to save each file before downloading' is unchecked
appInstallMsg.description: Shown during install and upgrade after the settings dialog is opened to tell the user to change settings as required

dbValueNotSetErrorMsg.description: When a piece or data cannot be retrieved to display to the user, this is displayed instead

badgePickupButton.description: Displays on the button to click to print a badge
